Directions: In a large saucepan, combine the potatoes, water, carrots, onion, salt and pepper; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 25 minutes or until tender. Add the remaining ingredients. Cover and simmer 30 minutes longer or until heated through, stirring occasionally. Discard bay leaves before serving.
Ingredients: 4 cups fresh or frozen cut green beans
1 1/2 pounds ground beef, cooked and drained
